definition: lit. good deeds do not go beyond the door, evil deeds spread a thousand miles/a good deed goes unnoticed, but scandal spreads fast (idiom)
pinyin: hao3 shi4 bu4 chu1 men2 , e4 shi4 chuan2 qian1 li3
containing_words.word: 好事不出門，惡事傳千里

definition: evil deeds spread a thousand miles (idiom); scandal spreads like wildfire

sentences.english: And he said unto me, Go in, and behold the wicked abominations that they do here.
sentences.chinese: 他說，你進去，看他們在這裏所行可憎的惡事。

sentences.english: An evil speaker differs from an evil-doer only in opportunity.
sentences.chinese: 說狠話的人和做惡事的人唯一的差別就是機會。

sentences.english: Abstain from all appearance of evil.
sentences.chinese: 各樣的惡事要禁戒不作。

sentences.english: Think of "Don't be evil" as an organizing principle about values.
sentences.chinese: 我們把“不做惡事”看作遵循正確價值觀的一條原則。

sentences.english: If there is goodness in your heart, it will come to your tongue.
sentences.chinese: 好舌頭不出惡聲，好心腸不想惡事。

sentences.english: The maintaining of one vice costs more than ten virtues.
sentences.chinese: 保持一樁惡事的代價超過於十件好事。

sentences.english: Abstain from every form of evil.
sentences.chinese: 各樣的惡事要禁戒不做。

sentences.english: Even on his bed he plots evil; he commits himself to a sinful course and does not reject what is wrong.
sentences.chinese: 他在牀上圖謀罪孽，定意行不善的道，不憎惡惡事。

sentences.english: I know something was going to happen to him, because what goes around comes around.
sentences.chinese: 我曉得早晚會有禍出在他身上，因爲做惡事有惡報。

sentences.english: Then said the children of Israel, Tell us, how was this wickedness?
sentences.chinese: 以色列人說，請你將這件惡事的情由對我們說明。

sentences.english: We have gone through this samsara (rounds of rebirth) for many aeons, and we have done good things and bad things.
sentences.chinese: 我們在輪迴中經歷了很多劫，做過善事和惡事。

sentences.english: David's sin was classified as despising the commandment of Yahweh and doing evil.
sentences.chinese: 大衛的罪是明顯的，他不顧耶和華的命令做惡事。

sentences.english: He turned away consistently from all that was wrong.
sentences.chinese: 他更不斷遠離所有的惡事。

definition: to convert to (a religion)/to rely upon/refuge/mainstay
to transmit Buddhist teaching/chakram or chakka (throwing disk)
the Four Noble Truths (Buddhism)/see also 四諦|四谛[si4 di4] and 苦集滅道|苦集灭道[ku3 ji2 mie4 dao4]
to extinguish worries and the sea of grief/nirvana (Buddhism)
